snippet: BRINN--Claire, died June 7, 2016. She was the loving wife of the late Murray Brinn, adored mother of Robin and Shari Brinn and beloved grandmother of Jonathan and Laura Prigoff. We celebrate the life of Claire, the funniest and wisest woman in the world. Her selfless and loving nature made her larger than life. She will always remain in the hearts of the many who loved her. Donations in her memory can be made to the Alzheimer's Association, a cause dear to the Brinn family, at: www.alz.org. 1/3
